data.name: Bus Simulator 21 - IVECO BUS Bus Pack
data.detailed_description:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!
Do you want to upgrade your bus fleet – preferably with brand-new buses?
Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

This Bus Simulator 21 – Bus Pack includes three new buses licensed from renowned manufacturer IVECO BUS!

Features

IVECO BUS Crealis
60-foot e-articulated bus with 3 axles and 4 doors.

IVECO BUS Crossway LE
40-foot interurban bus with 2 axles and 3 doors.

IVECO BUS Eway by HEULIEZ
40-foot electric bus with 2 axles and 3 doors.

3x Interiors
This bus pack comes with three authentic interior designs with specifically created color patterns for the seats and appealing floor textures. Go ahead and try them out (also available in your other buses) and become the next transport trendsetter!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4 830 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD FC-8140 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 (8GB VRAM) or higher

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
